severe_allergies.description: These things are bad. Keep them far away from Marisa.
All other nuts, roasted or not, are a no-no. [ Coconut is fine! ]

Believe it or not - it's true. Marisa has Exercise-Induced Anaphylaxis, a rare condition that causes a similar reaction to a peanut allergy. Usually a 1-2 hour wait after eating a meal is necessary before she can hit the dance floor.

food_allergies.description: I'm not sure how she manages without beer, but she does. She actively avoids stuff like bread, wheat pasta, pizza, flour, etc.
Keep your tofu and soya sauce in the fridge.
The magical fruit. The more you eat the more you... nevermind.

Marisa is really allergic to trees/plants. Like... really allergic. This is actually the reason that she has most of the other allergies listed here (tree nuts, etc). Certain raw fruits and veggies cause her to have a mild allergic reaction. Don't worry about hiding these away, but just know that she may avoid them. I cannot even keep track of which ones cause this. I think celery and apples?
